The Yissochor Dov (Beirish) Langsam Family of Bircza & Sanok


Some background email from the family can be found here.

Yissochor Dov (Beirish) Langsam (June 6, 1849 - ?) was born in Bircza, Poland. He married Esther Moritz (born September 9, 1846) of Sanok and had two known children born in Sanok. The four of them show up together on the 1900 census.

  • Perel (Aug 9, 1876 - abt 1942) was born in Sanok, Poland and married to Aharon Tzvi Bandel and they had 4 known children. Aharon Tzvi seems to have passed away prior to the war. Prior to WWII Perel lived in Delmenhorst, Germany. During the war she was in Sanok, Poland.
    • Dov recorded Pages of Testimony and lived in Ranana, Israel in 1956. He re-submitted pages in 1999 and was still living in Ranana.
    • Leah/Pola (July 14, 1903 - Aug 1943) was born in Sanok, Poland. She was married to Leopold Schoen (Mar 10, 1896 - Aug 1943), a radio technician. Prior to WWII she lived in Altona, Germany. During the war she was in Bruxelles, Belgium. Pola perished in Auschwitz.
      Aharon Tzvi & girl
    • Benjamin (Mar 7, 1908 - Oct 1943) was born in Sanok, Poland. He was a merchant, married with one child. Prior to WWII he lived in Delmenhorst, Germany. During the war he was in Brussels, Belgium.
      child
    • Betty (Sep 27, 1911 - Aug 1944) was born in Delmenhorst, Germany. She was married to Albert Simons, born in Berga, Germany in 1905. He was a butcher. Betty and Albert had 1 child. Prior to WWII they lived in Altona, Germany. During the war they were in Brussels, Belgium. The family perished in Auschwitz.
      child
  • Efraim (October 11, 1880 - abt 1941) was born in Sanok, Poland. He married Rachel and lived in Koln, Germany where they had three known children. Based on Pages of Testimony at Yad Vashem, he was deported to Poland in 1938 and perished in Siberia in 1941.
    • Ahuva lived in Tel-Aviv, Israel and was married to a Rosenfeld.
    • Chava lived in Holon, Israel and was married to a Tzuriel.
    • child with no other detail known.
  • Moshe Shlomo (March 15, 1882 - August 1942) was married to Ides Treff of Dukla. During the Holocaust they were in Dukla and they both perished in August of 1942.
    • Regina (1906 - 1999) married Chaskel Shraga Goldberg and they had one known daughter.
      Malka Finkel
    • Goldie married Hyman Hollander and had two known children.
      Steven & Marian Lorraine Wezenter
    • Benny was married and had two known children.
      child & Marilyn
    • Esther married a Blaut and they had one known son.
      Milton
    • Sydney Arnold (1909 - 1990) married Mary Mariyum Goldberg and they had one known daughter.
      Ida S.
